patthana23.20:1.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:1.1_1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.20:2.1_0: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:2.1_1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.20:3.1_0: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:3.1_1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.20:5.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:5.1_1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:7.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naabyākato dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.20:8.1_0: Ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā dvādasa, anantare terasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, kamme sattarasa, natthiyā vigate terasa.
